DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study compare efficacy enteric-coated mycophenolate sodium compare mycophenolate mofetil Chinese patient ( study conduct China ) measure incidence biopsy proven acute rejection , graft loss , death within six month treatment de novo renal transplant patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Enteric-coated Mycophenolate Sodium Versus Mycophenolate Mofetil Adult de Novo Renal Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Recipients first , cadaveric ( donor write consent form ) living relate nonHLA identical donor kidney transplant , treat cyclosporine corticosteroid primary immunosuppression . Second subsequent kidney transplant multiorgan recipient ( e.g . kidney pancreas ) previous transplant organ Patients receive investigational drug within four week prior study entry Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
